title: #327: Multiverse Traveling Starseeds with Von Galt
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Buddhist author Von Galt to talk about the world we live in and the belief that Jesus was a starseed sent to help steer this dimension in the right direction. This episode is mind-blowing and a game changer!

******(The internet connect was bad so some of the interview was super choppy! So for that it was out of our control!)***********

Please check out Von Galt's website:
Merkabachakras.com
